embed.title: S.V.G-BOT COMMANDS
embed.description:
To call these commands you have mention bot in message start:
```
@S.V.G-BOT command arguments
```

fields.name: snap `@mention1`, `@mention2`, `@mention3`...
fields.value: give snap to mentioned server members.

fields.name: gaycheck `@mention` or name
fields.value: by using complicated calculations and formulas detect how much user gay.

fields.name: steal avatar `@mention` or name
fields.value: get server member's avatar in big size.

fields.name: tic-tac-toe `@mention`
fields.value:
play tic-tac-toe with someone.
**How to play:** type message with two digits.
First one - is horizontal position. (1-3)
Second one - is vertical position. (1-3)
:bangbang: One game lasts 1 minute.
